SELECT cmt.id, u.name, u.avatar, cmt.author_id authorId, cmt.content, cmt.reply_cnt replyCnt, cmt.create_time createTime FROM
article_cmt cmt
video_cmt cmt
social_feed_cmt cmt
LEFT JOIN user u ON cmt.author_id = u.id WHERE cmt.content_id = #{contentId} ORDER BY cmt.create_time DESC LIMIT #{page}, #{size}

SELECT cmt.author_id authorId, u.name, u.avatar, cmt.content, cmt.reply_to_id replyToId, cmt.reply_to_name replyToName, cmt.create_time createTime FROM
article_cmt_child cmt
video_cmt_child cmt
social_feed_cmt_child cmt
LEFT JOIN user u ON cmt.author_id = u.id WHERE cmt.parent_cmt_id = #{cmtId} ORDER BY cmt.create_time DESC LIMIT #{page}, #{size}
